name: Billy Knight
descriptions: Billy Knight is a street comedian living on the Strip in 2281. He stands outside of the Tops casino, next to a gate dividing the Strip.
Billy Knight is a longtime professional comedian who has clearly fallen on hard times.
Note: The text in parentheses are parts of the line spoken by Billy Knight which are not in the subtitles.

PC After picking up Talent Pool from Tommy Torini, Billy may disappear from the game for no apparent reason. To fix this, open the console window (~ by default on US keyboards) and enter prid 0011F9BF, then enable.

topics.topic_text: How long have you been doing comedy?
topics.response_text: If you believe my mother, since she first laid eyes on me. First thing she said was "Boy! That's a funny-looking kid!"Play soundvmstopstal_billyknightcome_0011f…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_billyknightcome_0011ffff_1.oggnoicon

The name's Knight. Billy Knight. And this here is what a lifelong career in comedy will get you.Play soundvmstopstal_billyknightintr_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_billyknightintr_00120014_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Tommy Torini at the Tops is hiring entertainers. I could put in a word for you.
topics.response_text: Yeah? Hey, you're all right! Tell him I'll do it for a hundred a night! No! Fifty! No, twenty! Ten!Play soundvmstopstal_billyknightwork_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_billyknightwork_00120001_1.oggnoicon
Hey, come on, pal, I'm trying to put on a show here!Play soundvmstopstalentpool_greeting_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstalentpool_greeting_0012000b_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I didn't mean to interrupt.
I just have a few questions.
topics.response_text: All right, but make it snappy, this isn't exactly a lucrative career enterprise here.Play soundvmstopstal vmstopstalentpo_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120004_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: But we're standing on a street corner in the middle of nowhere.
topics.response_text: That's exactly my point, kid. Exactly my point.Play soundvmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120017_1.oggnoicon

Woof! If you're not the most sarcastic fella I ever met, your standards are so low they could use you at the Annual Gomorrah Saucy Limbo Competition.Play soundvmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_0012000e_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: So you're looking for your big break?
topics.response_text: A break's better than a shot - less chance of lead poisoning. Hey, if you know any gigs hiring, I'll work cheap. Real cheap. I'll take peanuts!Play soundvmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120018_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: With jokes like that, no wonder you're working the street.
topics.response_text: Hey, now, come on! I prefer the term "outdoor entertainment bonanza." Besides, have you seen the caps whores make in this town? I should be so lucky!Play soundvmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120003_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Don't sell yourself short. You're worth a lot more than that.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Whoa, geez, what was I thinking? You're right, I oughta go in there with a cool head, tell him how much I'm really worth.Play soundvmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120015_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Look, just hang out here for a bit, I want to make sure you get a deal.
topics.response_text: Hey, okay, but don't take too long, I don't want to miss this!Play soundvmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_00120…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopstal_vmstopstalentpo_0012000a_1.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: It's great to be here at the Tops, folks. The room I'm in has a lovely little closet. A nail.Play soundvmstopsper_topsbillyknight_00125…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Vmstopsper_topsbillyknight_0012547f_1.oggnoicon
